title: Label ID - Whole Earth
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905020623im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/stilldrinks_6541.jpg)

Hi,

Could anyone tell me the name of the ( Brush Script (?!) font used for:  
Apple & Pineapple Fruit Juice Drink  
Zesty Citrus Fruits,...  
In the label of these Whole Earth drinks.

Thanks! D.

 [‹ owp/p logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905020623/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41759 "Go to previous forum topic") [A couple of typefaces ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905020623/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41747 "Go to next forum topic")
author: DANNY S

comments.content:
A similar font is [Mercurius Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905020623/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/mercurius_bold/?sample_text=Zesty%20Citrus%20Fruits). Your packaging font may be custom.

- Mike Yanega

And [Sinclair Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905020623/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/sinclair-script-rr/) is even closer.

- Mike Yanega
